resources.string: Free, open-source, and privacy-friendly Dutch weather app
Shows a circle at my location

NLWeer is an open-source and privacy-friendly Dutch weather app. It is free both as in free lunch and as in freedom. The code is MIT licensed. Weather information is provided by KNMI and Buienradar, see below. For code, reporting issues, new versions, and more information see:\n\nhttps://github.com/CNugteren/NLWeer

All KNMI data has the Creative Commons Zero (CC0) license, with the note that KNMI itself is not involved with the NLWeer app and does not actively support the usage of this data in NLWeer. For more information see https://www.knmi.nl/copyright
Buienradar data is currently not used for NLWeer.
